attributes.action: indicate when all the remaining 'world changing' policies introduced by Nu-Labour since 1997 are to be abandoned in favour of what was in place before?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that the new dental services arrangements set up by the new contract 3 years ago have been proven to be an abject failure and is being reversed 'to what was there before' it must be only time before many other Nu-Labour fantasies - ESPECIALLY the Human Rights Act - are cancelled out because of failure.  Could it be there is an election coming up?

rejection.details: As a Government website we cannot publish party political material such as references to political parties. Refer to the terms and conditions for more information: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
